message.content:
I need to identify and extract the specific line items and value of income arising in the course of the entity's core operating activities.

Looking at the income statement, the core operating activity revenue is represented by "Main Business Revenue" which is the income generated from the company's primary business operations.

In the given income statement, the Main Business Revenue is 6920513.79 on 2024-01-31.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '6920513.79'} }
```
